title: [BUG] Zlib security identification
body:
### Description

SkiaSharp is showing up in our security idenificaiton software as utilizing zlib 1.2.13.1 which has the open CVE, [CVE-2023-45853](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-45853). This CVE in specific relates to Minizip. Can zlib either be updated to the latest 1.3.1 which has the fix or confirm that SkiaSharp does not use/include minizip?


### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)


### Code of Conduct

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
